overview: Art gallery owner Kathryn DeLayne uses her ample assets to get what she wants.  What she wants right now is to publicize the work of her new discovery Giorgio, and she's scheduled a show on a Tuesday to do just that.  Why a Tuesday?  Because it's her birthday and also the anniversary of the day she lost her virginity to a boyfriend who drove out of her life the very next day.  Except this ex-boyfriend has resurfaced ten years later wanting to get back together with her.
title: Steamy Windows
